node.statement: Twisted sector projectors (eq 2.13): Three projectors P_tau^{(1)}, P_tau^{(2)}, P_tau^{(3)} given explicitly with phases e^{+/-3pi*i/5}. Verify: (a) each is idempotent using eqs 2.10-2.12; (b) mutually orthogonal; (c) sum to id_tau. The projectors are constructed via the general formula eq 2.16 with characters chi^{(Gamma)} from the eigenvalue table.
